job_title: Internship - Regional Planning - Electrical Engineering or Computer Science/Eng (661)
job_description: You will be a member of the above group, which is responsible for:Transmission System Planning in the provinceLoad forecast, help develop and prepare Regional Infrastructure Plans (RIP)Policies, standards and approvals related to Transmission of electricity.Researching matters related to transmission system and impacting regulations, standards and compliance in the Ontario electricity market such as IEC, CSA, IEEE, NPCC and NERC. Your job duties may include:Data manipulation and data analysisCompilation of Load forecast and historical loads for forecasting methodology along with providing assistance with Regional Infrastructure PlansResearching and justifying the rationale of policies related to Transmission facilities.Gathering information and developing concepts that will form the basis for Hydro One Networks’ Tx investments and policies.Assisting in the support of information databases to develop and establish H1 RIP and Coordination Procedures.Providing departmental support on a development and RIP project.Providing departmental support administering health and safety program.Justifying Hydro One’s compliance with the IESO requirements, NPCC & NERC standards.Monitoring Hydro One’s involvement on the research and standard development front. This job will provide you with the following professional development:Insight into the Ontario and North American power system and the facilities that comprise it.Exposure to the issues and solutions related to transmission system planning, developing solutions and related investmentsRegulatory issues and Transmission and Distribution System CodesExposure to issues and challenges in the management of assets.Health and SafetyUnderstanding of national and international standards
